mapper.select: SELECT C.COMMENT_NO, C.FREE_NO, M.MEMBER_NO, M.MEMBER_NAME, C.COMMENT_TEXT, C.COMMENT_DATE FROM FREE_COMMENT C, FREE F, MEMBER M WHERE M.MEMBER_NO = C.MEMBER_NO AND F.FREE_NO = C.FREE_NO AND C.FREE_NO = #{freeNo} ORDER BY C.COMMENT_NO DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO FREE_COMMENT(COMMENT_NO, FREE_NO, COMMENT_TEXT, MEMBER_NO, HIDDEN_STATUS) VALUES (SEQ_FREE_COMMENT.NEXTVAL, #{freeNo}, #{commentText}, #{memberNo}, '0')
